```{r}
satis<- read.csv("train.csv")
print(unique(satis$satisfaction))
print(head(satis))
```

```{r}
vars<- c("Age", "Flight.Distance", "Departure.Delay.in.Minutes", "Arrival.Delay.in.Minutes", "satisfaction")
regrSub <- subset(satis, select = vars)
regrSub$satisfaction<- ifelse(regrSub$satisfaction == "satisfied", 1, 0)

head(regrSub)
```


```{r}
library(mgcv)

set.seed(100)

goodExperience <- gam(satisfaction ~ s(Age) + s(Flight.Distance) + s(Departure.Delay.in.Minutes) + s(Arrival.Delay.in.Minutes), 
                 family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = regrSub)

#shows some influence among Arrival/ Departure Times
plot(goodExperience, se=TRUE,col="purple")
```
